Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored an unbeaten 122 off 94 balls
Heinrich Klaasen scored a century off 66 balls
South Africa recorded the highest score of 382/5
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted South Africa as the favorites given their home advantage
South Africa won the toss and elected to bat first
Bangladesh's regular captain and star all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan returned to the team
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh will need to improve their batting fireworks, bowling in the death, fielding standards, and big-tournament mentality
South Africa now move to second on the points table with just one loss from five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The sun was hot and humid, affecting both teams' performances
South Africa's bowlers performed well in the last 10 overs, conceding 144 runs
